title: “Unjustifiable decision”: Former Karnataka CM Kumaraswamy rips into water management board over Cauvery directive
story: Amid the festering row over the sharing of Cauvery waters with Tamil Nadu, former Karnataka chief minister and JD(S) leader HD Kumaraswamy on Wednesday came down heavily on the Central Water Management Board terming its direction to the state government release 5,000 cusecs of water to the neighbouring state as an "unjustifiable decision".

title: "People should come out of fear”: RJD leader outlines INDIA’s main o
story: As the Opposition alliance — INDIA — proceeds to outline the contours of a combined challenge to the BJP-led National Democratic Alliance (NDA) at the Centre in the Lok Sabha elections next year, Rashtriya Janata Dal (RJD) leader Shakti Singh Yadav on Wednesday said the

title: PM Modi to arrive at BJP headquarters to attend Central Election Com
story: Leaders of Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) are arriving at party headquarters in the national capital where Prime Minister Narendra Modi is scheduled to arrive for the meeting of the party's Central Election Committee to discuss Madhya Pradesh and Chhattisgarh elections

title: "No one in this country is anti-Hindu...," Shiv Sena (UBT) leader Sa
story: After the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) called the coordination committee meeting an anti-Hindu meeting, Shiv Sena (UBT) leader Sanjay Raut said that every religion in this country is respected.

title: INDIA bloc's Coordination Committee meeting underway at Sharad Pawar
story: The first meeting of the Coordination Committee of the INDIA (Indian National Developmental Inclusive Alliance) is underway at NCP chief Sharad Pawar's residence in the national capital.

title: "Routine meeting": CPI leader D Raja reacts to all-party meet called
story: Responding to the all-party meeting, convened by the Centre ahead of the Special Session of Parliament, the general secretary of the Communist Party of India (CPI), D Raja on Wednesday said that it is a "routine meeting".

title: Several leaders arrived in Delhi to attend INDIA alliance Coordinati
story: Ahead of the first meeting of the Coordination Committee of the INDIA (Indian National Developmental Inclusive Alliance), several leaders arrived at the residence of NCP chief Sharad Pawar in the national capital.

title: “Nitish Kumar, Rahul Gandhi, Mamata Banerjee should be in coordinati
story: Speaking to ANI, Bharatiya Janata Party leader Sushil Modi said that the members of the INDIA’s coordination committee do not have any power to make any decision and eventually they will go to their party’s high command before making any decision.

title: "Anti-Hindu Coordination Committee...," Sambit Patra slams INDIA blo
story: Amid a row over Tamil Nadu Minister Udhayanidhi Stalin's remarks, Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) national spokesperson Sambit Patra on Wednesday accused the INDIA alliance of conspiring to abolish "Hinduism".

title: PDP workers hold protest against Centre’s decision to cut import dut
story: Supporters of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) on Wednesday staged a protest against the Centre's move to cut import duty on apples procured from the United States.

title: BJP MLA accuses K'taka govt of deliberately delaying permission for
story: "Congress government in Karnataka is deliberately delaying permission for Ganesh festival celebration for Hindu organisations," Hubli-Dharwad West MLA Aravind Bellad said.

title: Ajit Pawar-led NCP's X handle suspended after complaints by Sharad P
story: 'NCP Speaks 1' was suspended by X after multiple complaints by leaders of the Sharad Pawar-led faction of the NCP who claimed that the account was a copy of the original NCP Speaks account.

title: Govt calls all-party meeting on Sept 17 ahead of Parliament special
story: Ahead of the special session of Parliament, a meeting of the floor leaders of all parties has been called on September 17.

title: Centre does not want TMC’s Abhishek Banerjee to attend INDIA bloc me
story: "Today we will go to the meeting. The agenda decided in the Mumbai meeting will be discussed. Everybody is going to attend the meeting except Trinamool Congress. TMC leader Abhishek Banerjee is a member of this committee, he is not attending this meeting because the ED

title: Guv RN Ravi taking forward BJP's political agenda on Sanatana Dharma
story: "First I want to ask Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Home Minister Amit Shah do you know what Governor RN Ravi is doing there? I know that you know. Because there hasn't been a dispute on religion ever before in Tamil Nadu. The backward community is ruling there, runni

title: INDIA Coordination Committee meeting: Special Session of Parliament
story: Speaking to ANI, Clyde Crasto on Tuesday said that there are a lot of things to discuss including the five-day special session of Parliament.

title: West Bengal recruitment scam: Trinamool's Abhishek Banerjee appears
story: Reacting to the notice by the ED, the Trinamool leader said on Sunday that the notice required him to appear before the agency on September 13, the very day when the Opposition INDIA bloc’s coordination committee is scheduled to meet in Delhi.

title: Cauvery water sharing row: Karnataka CM chairs all-party meet to dis
story: Karnataka Chief Minister Siddaramaiah convened an all-party meeting on Wednesday to discuss the next course of action after the Cauvery Water Regulation Committee directed the state government to release 5,000 cusecs of water to neighbouring Tamil Nadu over the next

title: TDP worker stages protest inside plane in Visakhapatnam Airport agai
story: The TDP worker Adari Kishore Kumar staged a protest inside the plane at the Visakhapatnam airport on Tuesday.

title: Nagaland Assembly unanimously adopts resolution against UCC
story: After the Chief Minister moved the resolution against UCC, the House unanimously adopted it urging that the state be completely exempted from the purview of the proposed UCC.

title: BJD removes Soumya Ranjan Patnaik from party vice president post
story: Biju Janta Dal (BJD) on Tuesday removed senior leader and vice president of the party Soumya Ranjan Patnaik from his post.
